data.name: Results Roofing
data.address: 2828 E Trinity Mls Rd Ste 212, Carrollton, TX 75006

reviews.text: 2828 E Trinity Mls Rd Ste 212, Carrollton, TX 75006 Storm just rolled through? Leaks, lifted shingles, or fallen branches can’t wait. Our emergency response teams are on call 24/7 across DFW, Houston, San Antonio, and nearby areas—providing tarping, water mitigation, and damage documentation for your insurance claim. 📞 Contact us for immediate emergency service.

Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations. "For the price and service, I'd strongly recommend this company." "Quality customer service, communication and top teir work." "Results Roofing proved to be the right choice for my family and home."

These guys are roofing machines.  We worked with JT and it was essentially a concierge service roof replacement.  Aside from a beautiful finished product, the pricing was the most competitive we found, especially given the high level of … More
